product_details.name: Insignia Smart Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Excellence
product_details.description:
• Digital LED Display with Intuitive Control Panel
• Multiple Wash Cycles Including Express, Delay, and Temperature Control
• Large Capacity Front-Loading Design for Efficient Cleaning
• Energy-Efficient Operation with Smart Programming
• Sleek White Modern Design with Chrome Accents
• Easy-to-Use Dial Selector for Cycle Customization
• Clear View Door with Safety Lock System
• Advanced Water Management System
• Anti-Vibration Support Feet for Stable Operation
• Digital Time Remaining Display
• Multiple Temperature Settings for Various Fabric Types
• Compact Yet Spacious Design Perfect for Modern Homes

banner_details:
The banner features a clean and modern layout designed to highlight a washing machine product. It uses bold, uppercase typography for emphasis in two prominent text layers: `heading_1` and `heading_2`, which introduce the product with impactful messaging. The `tagline` layer underlines the theme with a subtle, elegant hue. Key features of the product are neatly itemized in bullet points within the `description` layer, while the `price` layer draws immediate attention with large white text. A rectangular call-to-action button, composed of `cta_button` and `cta`, invites user interaction. The right side prominently showcases the actual product via the `product_image` layer. 

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #193755 (background and text)
- Sky Blue: #4A9BD1 (graphic shape)
- Light Blue: #90CAF9 (tagline text, button)
- White: #FFFFFF (text, product highlights)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern washing machine with a clean monochrome color palette. Predominant tones include bright white (#FFFFFF), matte black (#1C1C1C), and shades of grey (#A9A9A9) for the drum and display area. Accents of electric blue (#00BFFF) are used sparingly in the digital panel and knob, drawing attention to controls and functionality. The harmony lies in the contrast — the bright white body sharply defines the black drum and interface, while soft grey gradients create visual depth. This palette conveys a sense of cleanliness, precision, and modernity, ideal for a banner emphasizing advanced technology and sleek design.
